name: Flux Branding
description:
Hi. We’re Flux Branding. We craft great brands that work. We love our spot at 1308 Factory Place in Downtown LA’s Arts District.
We love it because we think of ourselves as an idea factory, churning out great ideas that work for our clients.
Flux makes brands work and then we keep them working. Our IDEA Method is a proven process that ignites, distills, engages and activates great brands to great success.
